passive.name: Insight
passive.description: Increases the wearer's Effect RES by <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong>. For every {{2}} of DEF the wearer has, increases the wearer's DMG dealt by <orangeStrong>{{3, percent(fixed: 1)}}%</orangeStrong>, up to a maximum DMG increase of <orangeStrong>{{4, percent}}%</orangeStrong>.
